name: YourBrowserSucks
tagline: Tell vistors if their browser sucks or not
body: ### YourBrowserSucks.js. This library allows you to gracefully inform your site visitors if their browser is outdated. It is a quick and dirty library to include in every web-page that tests the browser. If the tests do not pass the web-page will be overridded by YourBrowserSucks web-page. Something similar to this ▾ ![youSuck](http://i.imgur.com/gUqrp8z.png) ### Tests To check if your browser is good or a badass YourBrowserSucks checks if supports some CSS3 properties, if some JS element are usable, if WebGL and LocalSotrage are present and other few things like ´const´ and ´let´. ### What if your browser sucks..? Four links will be provided to download your favorite browser latest release. Only chrome will be suggested if you are on mobile. *** ### Authors and Contributors It is manteined by me @Naramsim. Fork the repo and create pull requests whenever, wherever, however you want.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
